Name: The Sea Just Within Reach
Description: Discuss the Submerged Tunnel rebuild with Abby
QuestDesc: Discuss the Submerged Tunnel rebuild with Abby

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Submerged Tunnel is finally done! What an undertaking...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's see what it says: "Through its transparent design and holographic projections, the Submerged Tunnel offers travelers a breathtaking visual journey..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And speaking of holograms... I have the coolest idea, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since the whole view is just a projection... whaddya say we project something even cooler?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Like, change the schools of fish into Dragons of Dirge, or turn the water into fire and make the whole tunnel a Path of the Inferno!

Options.PlotLineKey: I like the way you think.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, just humor me would you, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Isn't Mornye some big scientist at the Research Institute? She can help us with this!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, alright...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mornye is still on sick leave. I'll send her a message.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry to keep you waiting, Mentor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before coming here, I did a remote search through the Institute's database.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The projections can be changed, but to get the effects you're describing, you'd have to consider the optic engine architecture, lens quality, display chip specs…

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you want, I could—

Options.PlotLineKey: That's not what I wanted to talk about.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't you think you ought to be resting in your condition?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But it's about keeping a good mood...

Options.PlotLineKey: The Submerged Tunnel scenery is stunning.
How about we go take it in together?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're going to love it, I'm sure of it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay. I will endeavor to focus on enjoying this trip with you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember that before the Submerged Tunnel was closed, it was just an ordinary tunnel. I can't believe you managed to turn it into this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's like going through the ocean in a submarine.

Options.PlotLineKey: Wouldn't a fish make more sense?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A fish's vision covers 360 degrees. I don't think a human could experience the scenery quite the way they do.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you prefer to imagine yourself as a fish? Let me try. Maybe I can look in both directions at once...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Exactly! They're used for deep-sea surveys. It uses multiple propellers, so it's highly maneuverable. It can move freely in the water...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh... similar to how you're steering the motorbike right now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, look, Mentor! Jellyfish!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They glow like stars in the ocean.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, I'm sorry. I should have said, "Look, holographically projected jellyfish!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wonder if the real ones are even prettier.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You know… even though I know so much about it, I've never actually seen the real ocean.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even though I was born in the New Federation, I never traveled because of my condition. And after coming to Lahai-Roi, I never left because of confidentiality requirements.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I bet you've been to all sorts of places. Can you tell me what the ocean really looks like?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A blue sparkling with faith, myth, and celebration.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It sounds... Beautiful. Serene.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A black sea where fog and storms guard its secrets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sounds like a place just begging to be explored.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even though this isn't the real ocean, it's still a sight to see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the best kind of scenery is the kind I get to see with you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for showing me this, Mentor. I feel... really happy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's like you said. Taking in the scenery really does help you keep a positive attitude.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, we're near the Research Institute now. I should get back to work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe... I'm only joking, Mentor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll rest up until my sick leave is over, just like you said.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And after you go back to work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, um... The next time I want to take a break, can I invite you? Like we did today?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then I'd like to reserve a spot in your schedule.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mornye
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I hope one day I'll get to see the real ocean with you.
